commit.message:
Rework to generate Citus workerlist file

This project now listens to Docker Cloud events and regenerates the
worker list file used by Citus. By colocating this container with the
Citus master node, this container can send a SIGHUP to force config
reload (the SIGHUP is sent using the plain-jane Python Docker client).

committer Jason Petersen <jason@citusdata.com> 1456948037 -0700

Rework to generate Citus workerlist file

This project now listens to Docker Cloud events and regenerates the
worker list file used by Citus. By colocating this container with the
Citus master node, this container can send a SIGHUP to force config
reload (the SIGHUP is sent using the plain-jane Python Docker client).
